Mel has worked on projects for NBC, CBS, FOX, ABC, NIKE, MOJO Hi-Definition Network, AOL TV, History Channel, Voice Entertainment films, Pay Per View, Island Def Jam Records and National Geographic. Her journey includes stories on everything from elections to Fear Factor, world religions to jumping off mountains, scuba to sleeping in the jungle, vision quests to sailing across Baja.SOME EXAMPLES:*Inspirational Films: Media consulting/producing for new spiritual film company (quantum physics subjects mostly). Picked up for distribution by Intention Media who handled 'What the Bleep Do We Know.' Field producing ‘Gifted Children of the World.’*Hi-Definition TV Series Producer: Produced and hosted original series for INHD (now MoJo), called ‘Go!’ from concept to completion. Location-based around US, Canada and Mexico. *Former Live TV News Reporter/Producer: Major affiliates across the country including Baltimore, Chicago, Houston and Phoenix.*Environmental Programming: Major production work for Intl. Solar power company, Eco-fuels series, green viral videos.*International Producer/Intrepid Traveler: Worked on international docs/TV show for History Channel and various networks, freelanced for National Geographic Channel in London, traveled to many third-world countries.

summary: Mel Sellick is the Founder and Chief Media Architect of the ReFrame network. Her professional career encompasses production, presenting and publishing.Mel is a veteran live news reporter, author and original content creator and producer whose portfolio includes working with nearly a dozen of the world's top media networks and brands including NBC, CBS, History Channel, NIKE, the MOJO Hi-Def Network, Island Def Jam Group and others.  As an original content creator and producer, she has been commissioned to manage and execute projects from personal growth series to cutting-edge music video specials to provocative environmentally-themed documentaries.Her media portfolio also includes traveling and working around the world in the capacities of an international, executive media trainer specializing in powerful, authentic presentations with cross-cultural sensitivities. As a Huffington Post blogger, Mel shares stories and introduces concepts pertaining to mindfulness, human capital and other timely topics.Mel's professional mission fuses together her three pillars of expertise to introduce a new media blueprint: a network dedicated to sharing stories and resources that engage, inspire and activate our infinite potential to solve humanity’s greatest challenges and to live lives full with meaning, connection and purpose.
name: MEL SELLICK
title: Founder & Chief Media Architect, ReFrame Network
